snippet: A six-CD set of the Allman Brothers Band at the Fillmore East in 1971, and and eight-CD, two-DVD set of Elvis Presley performances will released this summer.
abstract: A six-CD set of the Allman Brothers Band at the Fillmore East in 1971, and and eight-CD, two-DVD set of Elvis Presley performances will released this summer.

headline.main: Heavy Lifting From the Vaults: Lots of Allmans and Elvis on the Way
headline.print_headline: The Allmans and Elvis Sally From the Vaults
